title: Mel B shatters sex pot reputation by insisting she's never had a one night stand
text:

Mel B is known for being one of the wildest members of the Spice Girls, but she's insisted she's more tame than people might think.

The singer, 44, has revealed she's never had a one night stand and can be "very shy" around men.

She shocked fans earlier this year when she claimed she'd had a lesbian fling with Geri Horner, and there were also claims she'd enjoyed a brief tryst with James Arthur.

Despite her outrageous Scary Spice persona, Mel says she's a romantic.

She told Closer magazine: "I think people always think of me as loud and scary but, actually, I'm a real romantic.

(Image: Getty Images)

"I like to be treated like a lady. I have never had a one-night stand and, believe it or not, I can be very shy."

Last week Mel finally confirmed she is dating her hairdresser Rory McPhee, who is 13 years her junior.

She has been seeing the handsome 31-year-old on and off for at least two years.

(Image: Getty Images)

According to The Sun on Sunday, the pair made their relationship official after attending a friend's wedding five weeks ago as a couple.

It is reported that Mel and Rory met through her cousin, actor Christian Cooke.

A source saidd: "Mel and Rory have been friends for years. Sparks flew between them two years ago, but they have upped the ante by going public. At the wedding they looked so happy together.

(Image: Instagram)

"Mel isn't looking for a serious relationship, and Rory is very easygoing, so they are keeping things very casual and chilled for now."

The source added the Spice Girl "can’t stop smiling when she's around him."

Leeds lad Rory allegedly grew close to the mum-of-three shortly after she split from her ex-husband Stephen Belafonte in 2017.
description: Despite her outrageous Scary Spice persona, Mel, 44, says she's a romantic and likes to be treated 'like a lady'
